title: Educational Modeling Language and Pedagogical Knowledge Sharing Practicum

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment where practitioners model instructional scenarios, test them in VR settings, and share feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can structurally design language education scenarios using Educational Modeling Language (EML).
Learners can knowledgeize and share pedagogical methods according to educational contexts by applying the DIN instructional design object model.
Learners can evaluate and improve peers' instructional scenarios using VR simulation tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
